languages.text: "Служи ново{mf|му|ой} хозя{mf|ину|йке} верно, моя любимая винтовочка! Прошу, не забывайте смазывать ее лучшими маслами, иначе она становится капризной". {n}Янрис одной рукой смахивает влагу с глаз, а другой — щелкает пальцами, и ближайший слуга отдает фактотуму свое оружие.{/n}

"Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Служи ново{mf|му|ой} хозя{mf|ину|йке} верно, моя любимая винтовочка! Прошу, не забывайте смазывать ее лучшими маслами, иначе она становится капризной". {n}Янрис одной рукой смахивает влагу с глаз, а другой — щелкает пальцами, и ближайший слуга отдает фактотуму свое оружие.{/n}

languages.text: "Leiste {mf|deinem neuen Besitzer|deiner neuen Besitzerin} treue Dienste, mein liebes Gewehr! Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denkt daran, nur die besten Öle zu verwenden, damit es nicht unleidig wird." {n}Janris bedeckt mit einer Hand seine Augen und schnippt mit der anderen mit den Fingern, um einem Diener zu bedeuten, ihm seine Waffe zu bringen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Leiste {mf|deinem neuen Besitzer|deiner neuen Besitzerin} treue Dienste, mein liebes Gewehr! Bitte, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denkt daran, nur die besten Öle zu verwenden, damit es nicht unleidig wird." {n}Janris bedeckt mit einer Hand seine Augen und schnippt mit der anderen mit den Fingern, um einem Diener zu bedeuten, ihm seine Waffe zu bringen.{/n}

languages.text: « Sers fidèlement ton nouveau propriétaire, cher fusil ! De grâce, Votre Seigneurie, n'oubliez pas de graisser cette arme avec les meilleures huiles ou elle deviendra grincheuse. » {n}Janris écrase une larme d'un revers de la main et claque des doigts pour ordonner au serviteur le plus proche de lui remettre son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sers fidèlement ton nouveau propriétaire, cher fusil ! De grâce, Votre Seigneurie, n'oubliez pas de graisser cette arme avec les meilleures huiles ou elle deviendra grincheuse. » {n}Janris écrase une larme d'un revers de la main et claque des doigts pour ordonner au serviteur le plus proche de lui remettre son arme.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Sirve bien a tu nuev{mf|o|a} dueñ{mf|o|a}, mi querido rifle! Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, no olvide aplicar los mejores aceites, se pone muy temperamental si no». {n}Janris se frota los ojos con una mano y, con la otra, chasquea los dedos para ordenar al sirviente más cercano que le entregue su arma.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sirve bien a tu nuev{mf|o|a} dueñ{mf|o|a}, mi querido rifle! Por favor, mi{mf|lord|lady}, no olvide aplicar los mejores aceites, se pone muy temperamental si no». {n}Janris se frota los ojos con una mano y, con la otra, chasquea los dedos para ordenar al sirviente más cercano que le entregue su arma.{/n}

languages.text: 「新たな持ち主に忠実に使えるのだ、我が愛銃よ！どうか、陛下、最高級のオイルを塗ることをお忘れなく。さもないと、彼女はへそを曲げかねません」{n}ジャンリスは片手で目を拭い、もう一方の手で指を鳴らすと、一番近くにいる従者に武器を渡すように命じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「新たな持ち主に忠実に使えるのだ、我が愛銃よ！どうか、陛下、最高級のオイルを塗ることをお忘れなく。さもないと、彼女はへそを曲げかねません」{n}ジャンリスは片手で目を拭い、もう一方の手で指を鳴らすと、一番近くにいる従者に武器を渡すように命じた。{/n}

languages.text: “好好服侍你的新主人吧，我亲爱的步枪！拜托了，大人，请务必用最好的枪油进行保养，否则她可能会耍小脾气。”{n}詹里斯一只手轻轻擦着眼睛，另一只手打了个响指，命令离他最近的仆人把武器交出来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好好服侍你的新主人吧，我亲爱的步枪！拜托了，大人，请务必用最好的枪油进行保养，否则她可能会耍小脾气。”{n}詹里斯一只手轻轻擦着眼睛，另一只手打了个响指，命令离他最近的仆人把武器交出来。{/n}

languages.text: "Canım tüfeğim, yeni sahibine sadıkça hizmet edesin! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, aman diyeyim en üst mertebe yağlarla kullanınız. Aksi hâlde çalışmazlık edebilir." {n}Janris, bir eliyle gözlerini ovuştururken diğeriyle parmaklarını şıklatıyor ve en yakınındaki hizmetkârından silahını istiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Serve your new owner faithfully, my dear rifle! Please, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, do not forget to apply the finest oils, or she might get right cranky." {n}Janris dabs his eyes with one hand and snaps his fingers with the other, commanding the nearest servant to give him their weapon.{/n}
